text:
SeekPanda | Beijing, China / Seattle, WA | Full-time | Full Stack Software Engineer | ONSITE/REMOTE

SeekPanda is a premier curated marketplace for hiring translators and interpreters. We precisely matchmake reliable interpreters who knows the ins and outs of highly specialized industries. Long story short, we are the topmost platform in this industry, and we work with (thousands of) clients and interpreters all over the world. It's an amazing learning experience to pick brains from different cultures.

Our stack is service oriented. Technologies we are using: Elixir, Java, React.js. I personally come from a Ruby on Rails background and love this stack.

Find more on our website: https://www.seekpanda.com

Email me at jinru@seekpanda.com if interested.
